description: Delete a connection from a cluster's private endpoint service.

parameters.description: struct for passing parameters to the method [`cockroach_cloud_delete_private_endpoint_connection`]

cluster_id.description: cluster_id is the id of the cluster from which the private endpoint connection will be removed.

endpoint_id.description: endpoint_id is the id of the private endpoint associated with a cluster's private endpoint service.

parameters.title: CockroachCloudDeletePrivateEndpointConnectionParams

title: cockroachdb_cockroach_cloud_delete_private_endpoint_connection
